DylbillsVsSkyrimScriptCompiler.AlwaysOut.description: If checked, puts compiled .pex scripts in your skyrm or skyrim special edition/data/scripts folder as well as the Pex Output Folder. If no Pex Folder is set, .pex files are put here regardless.

DylbillsVsSkyrimScriptCompiler.GloballyS.description: If checked, saves last detected skyrim root folder Globally and is loaded globally when you restart VS code. Otherwise saves to current workspace.

DylbillsVsSkyrimScriptCompiler.OutputFol.description: Optional Full path to folder that compiled .pex files are sent to. If this isn't set, .pex files go to skyrm or skyrim special edition/data/scripts.
Optional Full path to folder that source .psc scripts are copied to when compiling.

DylbillsVsSkyrimScriptCompiler.SoundFile.description: Full path to sound that's played when succesfully compiling a script.
Full path to sound that's played when failing to compile a script.
